pages.title: Brown Bear
pages.text: The brown bear ($(o)Ursus arctos$()) is a large bear species found across Eurasia and North America.$(br2)In North America, the populations of brown bears are called grizzly bears, while the subspecies that inhabits the Kodiak Islands of Alaska is known as the Kodiak bear.
